works.description:
To whom it may concern,

I am writing this letter because once again I found more of our copyright
pictures in several discussion groups.  Could you please give attention and
priority to this letter and remove the pictures URGENTLY because the
publication of these pictures in those groups are creating big problems in
my relationship with my wife.

I have asked the owners and administrators of the messages and discussion
of several groups in Google to remove unauthorized photos of my wife and I,
which includes sensual and erotic contents, and which were stolen from our
computers.  These pictures belong to us and are of private matter, and this
is the reason why I am asking to remove these photos.

Therefore, I ask for your help in removing these messages and pictures from
the groups and discussions, since the photos are causing a great
embarrassment for my wife and I and also causing serious problems in our
relationship.  I should like if you can resolve this problem urgently.

My username in the Google group is:  morenobarra
and the e-mail I use for this username is:  ksalroka@unisys.com.br

However for communication issues with me, the best e-mail to use is:
rodney.oei@globo.com


To expedite the process I am following the format suggested in Google’s
Infringement Notification for Groups.

1.   Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe
has been infringed upon.

The discussion groups and messages that allegedly contains the infringed
material that contains the pictures are published in the following URLs:
1.
Pelada dos Amigos
TARADA! CAIU NA NET - OUTRA QUE FICOU FAMOSA. (cuidado)
BY:  Thomaz Anicio
Date:  March 28, 2012
